message.entry: The tolerance must be a real numeric scalar in the range sqrt(eps(class(A))) <= tolerance < 1.
The block size must be a positive integer.
Maximum number of iterations must be a positive integer.
Maximum subspace dimension must be a positive integer.
Number of power iterations must be a nonnegative integer, but is typically 0, 1, or 2.
First input must be a matrix of type single or double.
Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.
